title: Visual Bug:Gangplank Q[Gameplay]
body: I played Gangplank 3 or 4 times and i find a visual bug on his Q : after u shot the traget  the bullet remain  in mid air,for 2s, after it hits the target .

replies.body: Hey there! Thanks for the report! Looking at the bug ticket for this, if all goes well, you should see this fixed with the upcoming patch. :)
